item.title: Ether falls 7% following a multimillion dollar hack of a decentralized finance protocol
item.description: The Ethereum-linked token briefly fell below its critical $3,600 level as investors wrung their hands over several bearish events.

item.title: Fed Governor Lisa Cook, in first policy speech since Trump suit, says she's undecided on Dec. rate cut
item.description: The central banker said Monday that she supported the recent interest rate reduction and indicated she would be open to more.
